name: Lotus
description: Nelumbo nucifera, also known as lotus, is one of two extant species of aquatic plant in the family Nelumbonaceae.

name: Orchid
description: The Orchidaceae are a diverse and widespread family of flowering plants, with blooms that are often colourful and fragrant.

name: Bamboo
description: The bamboos are evergreen perennial flowering plants in the subfamily Bambusoideae of the grass family Poaceae.

name: Papyrus
description: Cyperus papyrus is a species of aquatic flowering plant, native to Africa, which forms tall stands of reed-like swamp vegetation in shallow water.

name: Turmeric
description: Turmeric is a flowering plant, Curcuma longa of the ginger family, Zingiberaceae, the roots of which are used in cooking.

name: Wasabi
description: Wasabi or Japanese horseradish is a plant of the family Brassicaceae, which also includes horseradish and mustard in other genera.

name: Ginger
description: Ginger is a flowering plant whose rhizome, ginger root or ginger, is widely used as a spice and a folk medicine.

name: Coffea
description: Coffea species are shrubs or small trees native to tropical and southern Africa and tropical Asia. Some seeds, called coffee beans, are used to flavor various beverages and products.

name: Yerba mate
description: Yerba mate is native to South America. The leaves of the plant are steeped in hot water to make a beverage known as mate.

name: Guarana
description: Guarana is a climbing plant, native to the Amazon basin and especially common in Brazil. Guarana is best known for the seeds from its fruit.

name: Paubrasilia
description: Paubrasilia echinata is the national tree of Brazil. This plant has a dense, orange-red heartwood that takes a high shine, and it is the premier wood used for making bows for stringed instruments.

name: Sweetheart
description: Sweetheart Plant is a fast-growing climber and one of the most popular foliage plants for growing in a room.
